options.name: Perfectionist's Focus
options.description: Perfection requires constant focus. You gain +1 skill with concentration. Additionally, once per day, you can reroll one concentration check.

options.name: Creative Vision
options.description: Gain +1 skill with expression. Additionally, once per day when you successfully craft something that you did not overcraft, you can roll an expression check in a second attempt at overcrafting.

options.name: Downtime Action : Obscessive Perfection
options.description: Spend 1 Resolve over the next day and make either a knowledge or craft skill check, recording the final result. After your next full rest, you may attempt to recapture that moment of inspiration. Roll a d12: on a 1, your check automatically becomes a 1; on a 12, it automatically becomes a 20. Otherwise, reuse your previously recorded check result as a static value.

options.name: Craft : Create
options.description: You put your soul into the next object you craft, gaining a bonus dice on your check. If the recipe fails, you lose 5 resolve.

options.name: Action : Optimized Attacks
options.description: You make a probing attack with a weapon or spell but with a penalty dice. If the attack hits or misses, you can discover one talent, skill, mitigation or invulnerability of the creature.
Gain +1 talent with social and +1 skill with expression.
